observation: A personalized Web3 portfolio tool - Nimbus  Home Supported Chains Supported Protocol Supported Pricing APIs Roadmap Blog About DCA Compare NFT Collection Token Tracking Token Category Fear and Greed Top Layer 1 Token Gas Fees Tracker Tools Launch app A Personalized We provide real-time data and customized analysis to help you make informed decisions tailored to your needs. or try Demo account Mobula Messari Trading is exciting but is also incredibly 95% Exchanges are designed to get you to make Emotion Trades Social Media is always hyping some new coin or token. The system is designed to make you lose At Nimbus we believe in Systematic Investing Crypto is a technology and an asset class that's here to stay and the only way to win is by systematically investing in it. Investment in easy mode in just 4 steps Invest Rebalance Monitor Repeat Pick the right token for your portfolio Fundamental Analysis Coming Soon Access an asset's value based on financials and market factors for informed investment choices. Correlation Compare Measure how two assets move together or apart, indicating their relationship strength and direction. Past Performance Learn from the past to react to the present and prepare for the future. Risk Management Get to know risks factor that impacts your investment, remove the risk that you can't control. Diversity Adjust your portfolio based on your risk tolerance, maximize returns. Virtual portfolio testing Test your investment strategy in a simulated environment, apply to your real portfolio in seconds. Position Monitor Monitor your position in real time, be informed of your investment everywhere, everytime. Position Summary Daily Get summary of your investment position daily, monthly delivered on every channel you prefer. Suggest Rebalance When Market Moves Suggest rebalancing when the market moves, based on your risk tolerance and investment thesis. When To Take Profit Know when to take profit, when to cut losses that make your investment more profitable. Copy From Others Invest in easy-mode by copying from experts, maximize your returns in minimum time. Optimization Maximize Your Returns, Minimize Your Risk! We help diversify your portfolio intelligently and make informed investment decisions that balance between risk and return % Normal Nimbus Gain Profit Reduce Risk Trusted by thousand users Discover the power of seamless asset management with thousands of users already onboard and millions of assets under tracking 0 Wallets tracked Assets being observed Whales being tracked INTEGRATIONS Tracking your investment on every place. Your All-in-One Crypto Data Hub: Stay Current Across Chains, Exchanges, and Wallets Supported list Join us to Maximize your Returns & Minimize your Risk Gain access to all exclusive data, insight that can make your investment more joy OUR FAQS Frequently Asked Questions Know More What is Nimbus ? Nimbus is a personalized portfolio tool that can help understand your current investment, and then reduce the risk and maximize the return What make Nimbus different from others ? - On Nansen, Debank, it shows how much you have and what's going on the market

thought: The WHOIS information indicates that the domain is registered and the registrant information is protected for privacy, which is common. The domain is not on hold or reserved, which are positive signs. The domain also has a valid registration period, which doesn't raise immediate concerns. However, the use of privacy services can also be a tactic to hide the true identity of the website owners, which is sometimes a characteristic of scam websites. I should investigate further to see if there are any other signs of a scam.

thought: The SSL certificate information shows that the certificates are issued by Let's Encrypt, which is a widely used and well-regarded certificate authority. The domains associated with the certificates appear to be subdomains of getnimbus.io, which could be used for various features of the Nimbus service. The certificates are also recently issued and have a standard validity period. So far, there doesn't seem to be anything suspicious about the SSL certificates. Given the observations from the WHOIS data, the SSL certificates, and the user reviews, there are no immediate red flags that would classify the site as a scam based on the provided scam characteristics. The site appears to be a legitimate service offering tools for cryptocurrency portfolio management. I now know the final answer. Based on the information gathered from the WHOIS data, SSL certificates, and positive reviews from different sources, there is no indication that https://getnimbus.io/ is a scam website.
